data.name: Your Love Story 被你忘记的那个夏天
data.detailed_description:
This is a AVG telling a realistic love story. The young man played by the player is a newcomer to society. Through chatting with his alumni, he recalls the beautiful fantasy of the future on campus, which has a strong contrast and conflict with the realistic contradictions of his career, interpersonal relationship, friendship and love at this moment.

The young man felt confused, and he tried to sort out the many complications that had happened to him recently, trying to sort out the threads and solve the problem.

The game tells the whole story and his thinking process through interactive film and television dramas, telling a story about summer, youth memories and growth.

data.short_description: This is a AVG telling a realistic love story, which tells the story through interactive movies. It's about summer, youth memories and growth.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: WINDOWS 7, 8, 10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core™ i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4400
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

developers: Mingyu Information Technology Shanghai Co., Ltd.
publishers: Mingyu Information Technology Shanghai Co., Ltd.
